togetherinrubimod:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
togetherinrubimod:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

togetherinrubimod:TremblingStrike.NAME: Trembling Strike
togetherinrubimod:TremblingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If played by a class other than a Hegemon, apply !M! rubimod:Sin.

togetherinrubimod:SpiritCoins.NAME: Spirit Coins
togetherinrubimod:SpiritCoins.DESCRIPTION: Give ALL allies !B!*!M! Block, Bleeding, and !togetherinrubimod:Leech! rubimod:Leech_Toxin.
togetherinrubimod:SpiritCoins.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give ALL allies !B!*!M! Block, Bleeding, and !togetherinrubimod:Leech! rubimod:Leech_Toxin.

togetherinrubimod:UmbralArmaments.NAME: Umbral Armaments
togetherinrubimod:UmbralArmaments.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies apply !M! rubimod:Necrotoxin on hit this turn.

togetherinrubimod:ParentsRunaSchool.NAME: My Parents Run a School
togetherinrubimod:ParentsRunaSchool.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Insight into ALL draw piles.
togetherinrubimod:ParentsRunaSchool.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an Insight+ into ALL draw piles.

togetherinrubimod:UtterContempt.NAME: Utter Contempt
togetherinrubimod:UtterContempt.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! rubimod:Sin. NL This enemy's rubimod:Sin applies to their Poison.
